description: (1/2)*Sum{|d(i)-e(i)|} where Sum{d(i)*2^i) is base 2 representation of n and e(i) are digits d(i) in nondecreasing order.
maple: A037879 := proc(n)        local a,dgs,dgsE ;        a := 0 ;        dgs := convert(n,base,2);        dgsE := sort(dgs) ;        for i from 1 to nops(dgs) do                a := a+ abs(op(i,dgs)-op(i,dgsE)) ;        end do:        a/2 ;end proc: # _R. J. Mathar_, Oct 19 2015
author: _Clark Kimberling_
extensions: Definition swapped with A037870. - _R. J. Mathar_, Oct 19 2015
